segments.text: I want to open a saving account , sir . What's the proper procedure ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First , you fill out the application form and then we'll issue you a passbook .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there any minimum for the first deposit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , Even a dollar is all right . Here's your passbook , sir , just sign your name on it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is the annual interest rate ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It varies from time to time . At present it is 6 % .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: By the way , can I open a checking account too ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By all means . But you have to deposit enough money before you can write out your checks .
segments.speaker: S2
